competitors.name: Apache Cassandra
competitors.notes: Open-source NoSQL database built for high availability and scalability

competitors.name: Redis
competitors.notes: Open-source in-memory data store offering extreme speed

competitors.name: Amazon DynamoDB
competitors.notes: Fully managed NoSQL database from AWS

competitors.name: RethinkDB
competitors.notes: Open-source distributed NoSQL database for real-time applications

context: By 2015, the NoSQL database market had matured significantly. MongoDB faced strong competition from various NoSQL alternatives, each with different strengths.
